resources.string:
1. Individual participation.
 2. There will be a pen and paper prelims.
 3. Final round will require participants to build their own website based on the given theme.
 4. Internet access will be allowed for reference.
 5. Copying an existing website is strictly prohibited and will lead to disqualification.

1. The symposium is on September 29th, 2018.

 2. There is no registration fee.

 3. Only College students can attend and college ID card is a must.

 4. Dress code: Strictly adhere to the dress code given below.

 Boys: NO T-SHIRTS or SHORTS.

 Girls: SALWAR WITH DUPUTTA

 5. Events commences at 8.30 am and will close by 3.30 pm.

 6. SVCE College transport can be used and you can check the bus number and routes from the Transport tab in the official Interrupt app and website.
